mapper.update: update tb_user set img=#{img} where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select uro.id AS "ID", u.user_id AS "userId", u.user_name AS "userName", u.password AS "password", u.birthday AS "birthday", u.sex AS "sex", u.img AS "img", u.status AS "status", uro.organization AS "organization", r.role AS "role" from tb_user u left join tb_user_role_organization uro on uro.user_id=u.user_id left join tb_role r on uro.role_id=r.role_id ORDER BY u.user_id,uro.role_id

select uro.id AS "ID", u.user_id AS "userId", u.user_name AS "userName", u.password AS "password", u.birthday AS "birthday", u.sex AS "sex", u.img AS "img", u.status "status", uro.organization AS "organization", r.role AS "role" from tb_user u left join tb_user_role_organization uro on uro.user_id=u.user_id left join tb_role r on uro.role_id=r.role_id where u.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%') and uro.organization=#{organization} ORDER BY u.user_id,uro.role_id
